data.title: Ernest Arthur Wilkinson (1908-1997)
data.meta_description: Birth of Ernest Arthur Wilkinson in Catford, London, UK in 1908 and his death in Lambeth in 1997
data.text:
Dates

Birth: 17 August 1908 Catford, London, UK

Father: Arthur James Wilkinson 1875-1954

Mother: Ethel Kate Croucher 1879-1920

Marriage: Unknown

Wife: Unknown

Death: May 1997 Lambeth, Greater London, UK

Children

Unknown

Notes

Birth of Ernest Arthur Wilkinson in FreeBMD in July-September 1908 in Lewisham (1d 1160).

In the 1911 census as Ernest H (sic - in the index, A on the original) Wilkinson aged 2, born in Catford, and living with his parents (Arthur James and Ethel Kate) and two sisters (Melsie and W Ivy E) in four rooms at 75 Honley Road, Catford, Lewisham, London.

His sister was born in Lambeth in 1913.

His mother died in 1920.

Five entries in Ancestry London, England, Electoral Registers, 1832-1965 for Ernest Arthur Wilkinson address 30 Boveney Road, Honor Oak Park, Lewisham from 1934 to 1938, other occupants Mabel Elsie Wilkinson (sister?), and Kathleen Gertrude Mary Wilkinson (sister?) from 1935, and eight entries for Ernest A Wilkinson address Flat 6, 202 Kennington Lane, Prince, Vauxhall, Lambeth from 1952 to 1964, other occupant Robert Tessiau.

Entry in Supplement to the London Gazette 5 September 1944 p4116 Royal Air Force Volunteer Reserve General Duties Branch Appointment to commission As Plt. Offs. on prob. (emergency):- [...] Sgts. [...] 13th July 1944 [...] 1677287 Ernest Arthur Wilkinson (179523)".

Entry in Ancestry UK, Outward Passenger Lists, 1890-1960 for Ernest Wilkinson born 17 August 1908 address 202 Kennington Lane SE11, and a civil servant sailed on on United States, United States Line from Southamton on 25 September 1957 for New York (Robert Tessiau born 3 January 1905 of the same address and a French Embassy Officer was on the same ship).

Entry in Ancestry UK, Incoming Passenger Lists, 1878-1960 for Ernest A Wilkinson born on 17 August 1908, single, address Flat 6, 202 Kennington Lane, London, and a civil servant, arrived Southampton on 5 November 1957 on United States, United States Line from New York.

Entry in the Register of Deaths for Ernest Arthur Wilkinson, born on 17 August 1908, in May 1997 in Lambeth (D54 2411D).

There are ten entries in Ancestry Public Member Trees for Ernest Arthur Wilkinson born on 19 August 1908 in Catford, Lewisham, parents Arthur James Wilkinson and Ethel Kate Croucher, and his death in Lambeth, London in 1997.

Relationship

Ernest Arthur Wilkinson was my second cousin once removed.
